| HistoryText             = The Heavy Hitters were the Nevada team of the [[50-State Initiative (Earth-616)|50-State Initiative]]. After having dealt with a Skrull infiltrator on the Desert Stars Initiative team, [[Delroy Garrett Jr. (Earth-616)|3-D Man]] and the [[Skrull Kill Krew]] traveled to Nevada along with Desert Stars member [[Komodo]]. There, they killed a Skrull that had infiltrated the Heavy Hitters team as an unnamed member. Hardball left with these heroes to deal with the Skrulls on the other teams.

Following the invasion, Hardball later betrays and quits the team, and becomes the leader of [[Hydra (Earth-616)|Hydra]].{{r|Avengers: The Initiative Special #1}}

Representatives of the Heavy Hitters were among the Initiative members that meet with [[Richard Gilmore (Earth-616)|Prodigy]] in [[Washington, D.C.]] to talk about the hammers that the [[Cul Borson (Earth-616)|Serpent]] brought to Earth.{{r|Fear Itself: Youth in Revolt Vol 1 1}}

==Members== 
*[[Roger Brokeridge (Earth-616)|Hardball]] (Roger Brokeridge) - Team Leader, has the ability to produce a variety of energy balls originating from his hand, including "hard energy" and electro-magnetic energy.  
*[[Richard Gilmore (Earth-616)|Prodigy]] (Richard Gilmore) - costume provides superhuman strength and durability, near-flight leaping ability. Uses his Cape to Glide.
*[[Greg Willis (Earth-616)|Gravity]] (Greg Willis) - Gravity manipulation
*[[Madeleine Michaels (Earth-616)|Nonstop]] (Madeleine Michaels) - Super-speed and wind generation
*[[Marina Zane (Earth-616)|Telemetry]] (Marina Zane) - Creates psionic-based constructs
*[[Frederick Myers (Earth-616)|Outback]] (Fred Myers) - He is the former villain Boomerang. Wields variety of lethal and gimmicked boomerangs.
*An [[Skrull (Heavy Hitters) (Earth-616)|unnamed Skrull]]
